entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation and its subsidiaries are the subjects of an audit for the years ending January 30, 2022, and January 31, 2021, covering consolidated financial statements.

entities.name: COMMITTEE OF SPONSORING ORGANIZATIONS OF THE TREADWAY COMMISSION (COSO)
entities.description: COSO issued the Internal Control - Integrated Framework (2013) used as a criterion for auditing NVIDIA Corporation's internal control over financial reporting.

entities.name: PUBLIC COMPANY ACCOUNTING OVERSIGHT BOARD (PCAOB)
entities.description: The PCAOB is a public accounting firm regulator responsible for the auditing standards followed during the audit of NVIDIA Corporation.

entities.name: SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION (SEC)
entities.description: The SEC is a regulatory body whose rules and regulations the auditing firm adhered to for maintaining independence in the audit of NVIDIA Corporation.

relationships.target_entity: COMMITTEE OF SPONSORING ORGANIZATIONS OF THE TREADWAY COMMISSION (COSO)
relationships.relationship_description: COSO's framework was used as the criterion for auditing NVIDIA Corporation's internal control over financial reporting.
The PCAOB's standards were followed during the audit of NVIDIA Corporation.
The audit firm maintained independence in accordance with the rules and regulations of the SEC while auditing NVIDIA Corporation.
